name: Memories of Melodies
description:
You wake up in the middle of the forest, unable to remember the way home. The obscure musical hints provided to you by the colourful locals might help restore your memories of melodies from home, and guide you back to where you belong.

This was made as part of the global game jam of 2019. In the Christchurch region.

Robert Condon, Programer, Lead: https://sensualstove.itch.io/
Emelia Todd-Lister, Art and Animation:  https://atopls.itch.io/
Juan Miguel Eslava, Programer:  https://itch.io/profile/jmeslava
Jordan wiersma-moore, Programer and QA
Cameron Buyers, Music and Sound: https://itch.io/profile/yobro39
